name: Station Escape Omicron 2
description:
You are trying to escape Space Station Omicron.  Use dual stick controls (WASD and Arrows or gamepad) to destroy enemy generators.  Destroy all generators in a room and get a key to move onto the next room.  Sometimes you can choose from several exits and its up to you to figure out the shortest path to the exit.  The exit looks like a trophy just bump into it to win!

The number of generators that are still in this room is in the bottom left.  When you destroy all of the generators in a room the key will fall into the center of the room.  Pick it up and you can unlock the door.

This is the second game in the series.

Hint: Look for extra hidden keys and use them to skip rooms.
